Commands.Veraero: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Turns to Verstone after use.  Next turn comes faster.  Increases White Mana gauge by 2 (max value is 7).  White Mana grants BRV Regen.
Commands.Verstone: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Turns to Veraero after use.  Grants Dualcast (0 ability use cost) for 1 turn.  Increases White Mana gauge by 3.
Commands.Verthunder: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Turns to Verfire after 1 use.  Next turn comes faster.  Increases Black Mana gauge by 2 (max value is 7).  Black Mana raises Attack.
Commands.Verfire: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Turns to Verthunder after use.  Grants Dualcast (0 ability use cost) for 1 turn.  Increases Black Mana gauge by 3.
Commands.Enchanted Riposte: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack (replaces normal HP Attack).  Decreases White Mana & Black Mana by 1.
Commands.Enchanted Redoublement: 3-HIT BRV+HP attack (replaces normal HP Attack).  Decreases White Mana & Black Mana by 5.  Next turn comes faster.  Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.  Turns Veraero to Verholy and Verthunder to Verflare.
Commands.Attack Advance: Slightly raises Attack for 2 turns.  BRV stolen can overflow by a small amount for 2 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Jolt II Combo: 3-HIT magic BRV+HP attack.  Increases White and Black Mana by 2.  Extends the duration of Dualcast by 1 turn.  No Action Delay.  Doesn't increase turn count.  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count.

Passives.Veraero Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Veraero, Verstone and Verholy.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Verthunder Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Verthunder, Verfire and Verflare.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Veraero Charge: Increases the max uses of Veraero by 1.
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces Action Delay when using abilities continuously.
Passives.Verthunder Charge: Increases the max uses of Verthunder by 1.
Passives.Acceleration: Slightly increases Max BRV and Attack for 3 turns after using Veraero and Verthunder.
Passives.Veraero Extend: Increases Veraero's max uses by 2.When the quests starts:  - Grants Small Max BRV Up for 8 turns.When using Veraero:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Slightly raises its total potency.- Triggers an HP attack after use.- Lowers Action Delay.When using Verstone:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Greatly raises its total potency.- Doesn't increase turn count.- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count.After using Enchanted Redoublement:- Turns Veraero/Verstone to Verholy.- Verholy has the following effects: + 4-HIT magic BRV+HP attack. + BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV. + Low Action Delay. + Increases White Mana by 4. + Turns to Verstone after use. + Turns Verflare back to Verthunder/Verfire before using Enchanted Redoublement.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Verthunder Extend: Increases Verthunder's max uses by 2.When using Verthunder:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Slightly raises its total potency.- Triggers an HP attack after use.- Lowers Action Delay.When using Verfire:- Increases the number of hits to 3.- Greatly raises its total potency.- Doesn't increase turn count.- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count.When using Enchanted Redoublement:- Tremendously raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.- Extends the duration of Max BRV Up by 2 turns.- Lowers White/Black Mana consumption by 1.After using Enchanted Redoublement:- Turns Verthunder/Verfire to Verflare.- Verflare has the following effects: + 4-HIT Fire-elemental magic BRV+HP attack. + BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV. + Low Action Delay. + Increases Black Mana by 4. + Turns to Verfire after use. + Turns Verholy back to Veraero/Verstone before using Enchanted Redoublement.
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Power: Raises Initial BRV and Attack by 20%.
Passives.Attack Advance Extend: When using Attack Advance, adds the following effects:- Slightly raises the potency of Attack Up.- Slightly raises the overflow limit.

Weapons.Shire Rapier CP: 35: Increases the potency of Verthunder, Verfire, Verflare and Enchanted Redoublement.Raises Black Mana by one more point when using Verthunder or Verfire.
Weapons.Murgleis CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Jolt II Combo.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Increases the max uses of Attack Advance by 1.Extends the duration of its effects by 2 turns.
Weapons.Mythrite Rapier CP: 15: Increases the potency of Veraero, Verstone, Verholy and Enchanted Riposte.Raises White Mana by one more point when using Veraero or Verstone.
